data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Delaware.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Delaware, United States
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 976,700 citizens of Delaware, United States, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Delaware, United States. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Delaware, United States.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Arab, Iraqi people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Delaware, United States.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Delaware.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Delaware, United States that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.
